body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? AI attacks with CS and doesn't allow me to block with any creature (Elvish Champion, Elf Warrior Token, Imperious Perfect) 
No spells or artifacts in play that would seem to allow this behavior. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.26
Windows 7 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [clayton....@ymail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115389003795609959110/)
title: Can't block Changeling Sentinel
content:
_From [clayton....@ymail.com](https://code.google.com/u/115389003795609959110/) on July 09, 2012 04:57:03_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? AI attacks with CS and doesn't allow me to block with any creature (Elvish Champion, Elf Warrior Token, Imperious Perfect) 
No spells or artifacts in play that would seem to allow this behavior. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.26
Windows 7 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.

**Attachment:** [game.log](http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=252)

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=252_
